price.description: A fixed amount that is charged once.
A fixed amount that is charged once every billing period.

pricePerUnit.description: The per unit rate to apply to usage for this product. In the case of percentage pricing where `isPricePercentage` is set to `true`, a value of 1 represents 100%.

usageMetricId.description: Usage metric associated to this pricing structure

isPricePercentage.description: Indicate whether the price attribute is to be considered as a percentage or an absolute value.

seatMetricId.description: Seat metric associated to this pricing structure

pricePerSeat.description: Price charged per seat per full billing period

prorationStrategy.description: The proration strategy to use when calculating the price for a seat. A `USE_MAXIMUM` will not prorate and charge the highest seat balance for the entire billing period, while a PRORATE_INCREMENTS will charge incremental seats from the day they're added

contractedMinimumSeats.description: The number of contractually agreed minimum seats

overagesBillingFrequency.description: The frequency with which to charge overages
